AttributeList.Text:
================================================================================ LTimer is used when a delay is necessary without using a hardware timer. The output of the timer will follow the input after a delay time. When the input drops to False, the output will drop immediatly.
During the activation of timer, hold input can freeze the timer * Input Hold = false then normal running of timer * Input Hold = true then timer frozen. ================================================================================

================================================================================ LTimer is used when a delay is necessary without using a hardware timer. The output of the timer will follow the input after a delay time. When the input drops to False, the output will drop immediatly.
During the activation of timer, hold input can freeze the timer * Input Hold = false then normal running of timer * Input Hold = true then timer frozen. ================================================================================

During the activation of timer, hold input can freeze the timer * Input Hold = false then normal running of timer * Input Hold = true then timer frozen. ================================================================================
